scripts.clean-install: pnpm run clean && pnpm run install-all
scripts.setup:
pnpm install-all && echo '
\033[1;42m\033[1;30m âœ… SETUP COMPLETE! \033[0m
\033[1;32mğŸ‰ All dependencies installed successfully!\033[0m
' && pnpm run help
scripts.build-all:
echo '
\033[1;33mğŸ—ï¸ Building all modules (installing dependencies first)...\033[0m
' && pnpm install-all && pnpm --recursive run build && echo '
\033[1;42m\033[1;30m âœ… BUILD COMPLETE! \033[0m
'
scripts.check-deps:
echo '
\033[1;34mğŸ” Checking workspace dependencies...\033[0m
' && pnpm list --recursive --depth=0
scripts.help:
echo '
\033[1;44m\033[1;37m ğŸŒŸ AI-POWERED WEB APPS WORKSHOP COMMANDS ğŸŒŸ \033[0m

\033[1;46m\033[1;30m ğŸ“¦ SETUP \033[0m
  \033[1;36mpnpm run setup\033[0m       - Install all dependencies
  \033[1;36mpnpm run clean-install\033[0m - Clean & reinstall everything

\033[1;45m\033[1;37m ğŸš€ DEVELOPMENT (choose one) \033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m1-start\033[0m   - \033[33mModule 1 START\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m1-end\033[0m     - \033[33mModule 1 END\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m2-start\033[0m   - \033[33mModule 2 START\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m2-end\033[0m     - \033[33mModule 2 END\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m3-start\033[0m   - \033[33mModule 3 START\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m3-end-01\033[0m  - \033[33mModule 3 END-01\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m3-end-02\033[0m  - \033[33mModule 3 END-02\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m3-end-03\033[0m  - \033[33mModule 3 END-03\033[0m
  \033[1;32mpnpm run dev:m4-end-01\033[0m  - \033[33mModule 4 END-01\033[0m

\033[1;43m\033[1;30m ğŸ”§ UTILITIES \033[0m
  \033[1;31mpnpm run clean\033[0m       - Clean all node_modules
  \033[1;31mpnpm run build-all\033[0m   - Build all modules
  \033[1;31mpnpm run check-deps\033[0m  - Check dependencies
  \033[1;31mpnpm run help\033[0m        - Show this help

\033[1;35mğŸ’¡ TIP: Use Ctrl+C to stop the dev server\033[0m
\033[1;35mğŸ”§ TROUBLESHOOT: Run "pnpm run clean-install" if you have issues\033[0m
'
